text:
Yes and no.
Both are choices. Only yes is an obligation.
notes: A variant of James Clear's 'No is a decision. Yes is a responsibility' from his 2018 Annual Review

text: A wealth of information creates a poverty of attention.
You don't just race onward to whatever comes next, you bring the past with you.
source: [Command Line Heroes: The Infrastructure Effect: COBOL and Go](https://www.redhat.com/en/command-line-heroes/season-3/the-infrastructure-effect)
